name: photofield
tagline: A dynamic gallery viewer for browsing large photo collections
description: Photofield is a self-hosted gallery viewer that displays images in a dynamic, zoomable canvas layout. Ideal for browsing large photo collections with intuitive navigation and a fluid UI.

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Smoothly pan and zoom through thousands of photos with hardware-accelerated rendering

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Display EXIF data including location, date, camera settings, and custom tags

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Automatically index photos from local directories with real-time updates

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find photos by date, location, camera, or custom metadata fields

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage enables smooth performance even on low-power devices
